name: LP Amina
overview:
LP Amina focuses on products that improve coal-fired power plantâ€™s emissions and efficiency. Leveraging 50 unique patented products to improve the firing system of a coal-fired boiler, including Rotating Vane Wheels, High Performance Classifiers, Coal Pipe Balancing Technologies, and Burner Enhancements, the Company provides products and solutions that will meet or exceed the expectations of their customers. Furthermore, LP Aminaâ€™s corporate culture is one of a relentless pursuit of continuous improvement. Utilizing the latest technology and traditional know-how from the Worldâ€™s two largest users of Coal for power generation, the Company is well positioned to develop new products and solutions to meet the ever changing needs of Power Industry.

LP Aminaâ€™s staff has over 20 years of experience in the design, fabrication, installation and commissioning of coal-fired power plants. During this time, the team has gained a wide range of experience from the evolution of the US Power Market. Increases in environmental regulations and free market driven energy prices have forced plant operators to reduce emissions and improve reliability while lowering operational cost. LP Aminaâ€™s engineering and design team will leverage this experience gained from the US and Europe to address the emergence of similar issues in China.
